channel.title: Customs-Switching item slots (PI) 317 Help please!
channel.description: Ok for a few days I've been trying to put a colored whip in the weapon slot but at the moment it remains in the helm slot I've tried atleast 12 guides nothing seeming to work, please help me or teamviewer that would be great :) http://prntscr.com/1lt9n6

item.title: Customs-Switching item slots (PI) 317 Help please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Uhm, usually theres an issue getting a helm into the right slot, you’ve managed to get it backwards
So, post your Item.java code that looks like this:

	public static boolean isFullHelm(int itemId) {
		String[] Data = {
		"med helm", "coif", "Dharok's helm", "Slayer helmet", "hood", "Initiate helm",
		"Coif","Helm of neitiznot","Armadyl helmet","Berserker helm", 
		"Archer helm", "Farseer helm", "Warrior helm", "Void", "Lumberjack hat", "Reindeer hat",
		"Larupia hat", "mask", "Kyatt hat", "Bomber cap", "Dwarven helmet", "Pernix cowl", "Vanguard helm", "Battle-mage helm", "Trickster helm"
		};
		String weapon = getItemName(itemId);
			if (weapon == null)
				return false;
		for (int i = 0; i < Data.length; i++) {
			if (weapon.endsWith(Data[i]) && itemId != 2631 && itemId != 11277 && itemId != 11278 && itemId != 20046) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
	
	public static boolean isFullMask(int itemId) {
		String[] Data = {
			"full helm", "Afro", "afro", "mask", "Verac's helm", "Guthan's helm", "Karil's coif", "mask", "Torag's helm", "sallet", "Saradomin helm", "Lunar helm", "Pernix cowl",
		};
		String weapon = getItemName(itemId);
			if (weapon == null)
				return false;
		for (int i = 0; i < Data.length; i++) {
			if (weapon.endsWith(Data[i]) && itemId != 2631 && itemId != 9925 && itemId != 10728 && itemId != 11277 && itemId != 11278 && itemId != 20046) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

It may have numbers instead of item ID’s.

Read full topic
